name: Zombie Crusher
description:
Protect the helicopter and crush these zombies before they crush themselves.

Your mission is to stop zombies from getting caught in the propeller blades of our transport chopper, group them together (Orders come from the scientist) and CRUSH THEM ALL! (Our Orders).

How to Play:
- Simply collect zombies of the same type together by dragging them by the feet.
- Touch them from the waste up, to smash them to pieces!
- Don't let them make it up to the helicopters propellers together
- The more zombies of the same type you smash together the higher your combo will be.
Game Features:
- Over (40 levels and more to come), Time Mode
- HD Graphics 7 totally terrifying enemy zombie breeds (Cops, Nurses, Fat Zombies, Randoms)
- Amazing visuals & immersive high quality audio
- Intense zombie Gore
